title: Surprise 4th of July interview w/ Killer Mike!
description:
The one and only Killer Mike, emcee extraordinaire, ATL Legend, one half of the legendary Run the Jewels crew drops by the show to talk about the surprise drop of his newest single and music video, "Run." The guys ask him about the song, and the stunning visuals, as well as everything else you'd want to hear from Killer Mike - Outkast, the Hawks, Atlanta Culture, his new PBS program, and much, much more. Tap in, and check out the new music video for "Run," out today! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Enjoy The Holiday With A Special Surprise Episode With Killer Mike!
